author: fwyzard
body:
Migrate all DQMEDAnalyzer modules from `edm::stream::EDAnalyzer<...>` to `edm::one::EDAnalyzer<...>`.

Migrate all DQMEDAnalyzer modules from `edm::stream::EDAnalyzer<...>` to `edm::one::EDAnalyzer<...>`.
    
This should significantly reduce the memory usage of a multithreaded DQM job, at the price of preventing the framework from analysing multiple runs or lumisections at the same time.
    
Lumisection-based histograms are handled in the `endLuminosityBlockProduce` method - which is only avaibale after the migration to `edm::one::EDProducer`.
    
For the time being, lumisection-based histograms are broken. If a workaround is needed, one could use the `postModuleGlobalEndLumi` signal of the `DQMStore` directly.
title: Migrate DQMEDAnalyzers from `stream` to `one` modules
